Test Name: Francisella tularensis Antibody, IgM and IgG (ELISA)
Purpose: To detect and quantify Francisella tularensis IgM and IgG antibodies in serum for the diagnosis of tularemia.
Container: Red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: ELISA microplate reader (450 nm filter), microplate washer, 37 Â°C incubator
